objects.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED
objects.description: Always leave this constant as false, only set to true for automated testing

objects.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_EVALUATION_CHIEF_VISIBILITY
objects.description:
Toggles whether or not evaluations have an evaluation chief.  Evaluation chiefs have contracting team level access in many parts of the application, so if you do not want any evaluators with elevated access, then this should be set to FALSE.

NOTE: If this toggle is set to FALSE in your environment, you will not want to place any users in the Evaluation Chairs group, as this groups also has contracting personnel level access and based on this toggle it will add/remove the Evaluation Chair group in the daily nightly process.

objects.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_EVALUATION_RECORD_LIST_ASSIGNMENT_DISPLAY_ONLY
objects.description: Toggles whether or not the evaluation record list displays all evaluations or just those to which the u-ser is assigned.  If TRUE, only those assigned to or created by the user will be displayed.

objects.name: AS_GSS_TXT_TASK_DESC_FOR_PROCESS_SETUP
objects.description: Value: Process Setup

objects.name: AS_ADT_BL_auditConfig_SAMPLE_Parent
objects.description: Audit config for the AS_ADT_SAMPLE_Parent CDT

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildAuditEntityData
objects.description: Calculates audits and the entity data to write

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildAuditLiveEntityData
objects.description: Calculates the entity data to write for the live table

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildSimpleFieldChanges
objects.description: Given a list of simple fields from an auditing configuration, an old object, and a new object, returns  list of simple field dictionaries which can be cast to the simple field auditing type of any complex auditing object.

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_buildSimpleFieldChangesDictionary
objects.description: Given the fieldName, original object, and the new object, determines if a simple field change was made, returning {} if not, and returning a dictionary representation of the simple field audit if so.

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit
objects.description: Primary rule to calculate audits between old and new objects (handles arrays or single objects)

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_MultipleObjects
objects.description: [DO NOT CALL DIRECTLY] Calculates audit CDTs for an array of original and new objects

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit_SingleObject
objects.description: [DO NOT CALL DIRECTLY] Calculates audit CDTs for a single of original and new object

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
objects.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_getNewObjectsAfterWritingFromMutipleDSE
objects.description: Queries for the new objects after writing them to the database

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_getOriginalObjects
objects.description: Retrieves the original objects from the database before generating audits

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_getPrimaryKeyField
objects.description: Returns the primary key field from the auditParams input

objects.name: AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters
objects.description: Populated the parameters for starting the audit process

objects.name: AS_CO_CONS_HEADER_LEVELS
objects.description: All available header levels

objects.name: AS_CO_CONS_REMOVAL_ICON_TYPES
objects.description: All available removal icon types

objects.name: AS_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField
objects.description: Standard display for a primary record-list field, uses a larger size and strong rich text

objects.name: AS_CO_DSP_selectionLink
objects.description: Creates a simple richTextDisplay field for displaying a generic dynamic link

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
objects.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getAndDisplayLabelSingle
objects.description: Retrieves and then displays a single label from a bundle file -- This is meant to be used in places where you cannot utilize local variables, such as record and site page names

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_getUserLocale
objects.description: Gets the Appian user locale as defined in the user preferences, returns the default if the user is null

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_isUserLocaleEnglishUs
objects.description: Returns true if the user's locale is en_US, which is English, United States

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
objects.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

objects.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey
objects.description: Parses a bundle key and returns a dictionary of the `bundleName` & `labelKey`

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse
objects.description: Default a null value to false, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue
objects.description: Default a null value to true, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata
objects.description: Automatically sets the "auditing" fields on a CDT, including createdDatetime/createdBy/modifiedDatetime/modifiedBy/isActive/isDeleted

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated
objects.description: Given two objects, performs a soft comparison on them (i.e. no type compare).  If the fields are all equal, does not update metadata, but otherwise does.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
objects.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_castToMapList
objects.description: Casts the input to a map list

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_cdtDistinctOnField
objects.description:
Returns only distinct CDT indices on a single field, returning the first index where there are multiples of the same value.

i.e. {{a: 1, b: 2}, {a: 1, b: 4}, {a: 5, b: 4}}, distinct on field "a" would return {{a: 1, b: 2}, {a: 5, b: 4}}

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_cdtDistinctOnFieldSingle
objects.description: Called by AS_CO_UT_cdtDistinctOnField -- do not call this rule

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfUserExists
objects.description: Returns true if the user exists

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is null/empty. Returns True or False.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_compare
objects.description: Compares two values and returns true if both the content of the values match (regardless of type).

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_compareStrong
objects.description: Compares two values and returns true if both the values and their types match.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_createSearchLogicalExpression
objects.description: Creates a wild-card search logical expression across multiple fields

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayCommonObjectBundleLabel
objects.description: Retrieves a single label from the Common Objects bundle file

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayGroupOrUser
objects.description: Returns a formatted user name or group name.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRefDataLabel
objects.description: rule to get the display value for the ref data

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRefDataLabelSingle
objects.description: Rule to get the display value for a single ref data

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage
objects.description: Returns default required message (used for all editable fields) if required message is not passed.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayUser
objects.description: Returns a display name for a user in the format of "firstName lastName". Null-safe.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_displayValue
objects.description: Executes displayValue, but allows setting the default to either the first or last value of the replacement list, or a custom value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
objects.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_dynamicDictionary
objects.description: Creates a dictionary based on the provided field-value pairs. An example implementation is provided as a test case. Returns a dictionary.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_enumForCount
objects.description: Return an enumerator for the count of the input objects

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
objects.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByMultipleFields
objects.description: Filters a CDT by multiple fields and values for those fields (acts as an AND filter)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues
objects.description: Returns any record that contains any of the provided values in the field

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterRefDataForSelection
objects.description: Rule to filter out ref data

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_fixed
objects.description: Executes fn!fixed() in a null-safe manner.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDate
objects.description: Formats a date for read-only text display. Note, do not use this rule to format date times, only dates. Returns text.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDateTime
objects.description: Formats a date time for read-only text display using the loggedInUser's timezone. Note, do not use this rule to format dates, only date times. Returns text.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_formatFieldEntryPlaceHolder
objects.description: Creates a formatted placeholder label for dropdowns.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition
objects.description: Returns the standard labelPosition based on the context of the component, allows for custom input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getSiteUrl
objects.description: Returns the URL of the site, terminating in /suite/

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_getTypeNamespace
objects.description: Returns the namespace from the type! input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
objects.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_initializeBlankLocalVariable
objects.description: Use this to initialize a null or empty local variable of a specific type. Pass `type` to initialize as a specific type, or `typeOf` to initialize as the type of another variable.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.
called_by: AS GSS Adhoc Setup Process Task
AS GSS TMG Task Action Audit

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
objects.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups
objects.description: Returns true if the user is a member of any of the groups (or condition), uses `loggedInUser()` if `user` input is null

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_left
objects.description: Executes the `left()` function with error handling for a null input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_not
objects.description: Null handles for not -- null returns true (null acts like false)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity
objects.description: Helper rule to execute queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
objects.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectValuesFromArray
objects.description: Removes specific values from an array

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
objects.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.
called_by: AS GSS Adhoc Setup Process Task
AS GSS TMG Task Action Audit

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber
objects.description: Returns the array type number from the input type. If type number being passed is already that of a array, returns the same number.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
objects.description: Returns the indices of a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields
objects.description: Returns the indices of a CDT by multiple fields and values for those fields (acts as an AND filter)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnGroupsUserIsAMemberOf
objects.description: Returns all groups from a parent group that the user is a member of, uses `loggedInUser()` if `user` input is null

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnMembersOfAnyGroups

objects.name: AS_GSS_TMG_UT_removeTaskFromProcessDuringSetupSaves
objects.description: Handles saves required for the removal of a task during the initial setup task that takes place at creation of a process.  Removes the given task index from the list of tasks, removes the index wherever it is found as a precedent of any task, and decrements all indexes that are greater than that of the removed task wherever they are referenced as precedents.
